data.eml:eml: Two peculiar new species of Otites Latreille 1804 (Diptera: Ulidiidae) with reduced phallus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morgulis, Elizabeth (2015): Two peculiar new species of Otites Latreille 1804 (Diptera: Ulidiidae) with reduced phallus. Zootaxa 3949 (4): 567-574, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3949.4.6
